# NSButton.BezelStyle.texturedSquare

**Case**

A bezel style appropriate for use with textured (metal) windows.

## Declaration

```swift
case texturedSquare
```

## Constants

- **NSButton.BezelStyle.shadowlessSquare**: A rectangular button with no shadow, so it can abut the cells without overlapping shadows.

items.description: A rectangular button with no shadow, so it can abut the cells without overlapping shadows.
items.name: NSButton.BezelStyle.shadowlessSquare
